${modID}:BuiltMiner.NAME: Pocket Miner
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, channel 1 Miner and add 1 Material to your hand.

${modID}:BuiltTurret.NAME: Pocket Turret
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, channel 1 Turret and add 1 Material to your hand.

${modID}:ProductivityModule.NAME: Productivity Module
${modID}:ProductivityModule.FLAVOR: So I heard you like free stuff...
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b3 Material #yConsumed, draw #b1 card. NL If it would happen after the end of your turn, draw them next turn instead.

${modID}:TungstenCarbide.NAME: Tungsten Carbide
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b3 Block for each #yMaterial in your hand.

${modID}:MandiBlade.NAME: Mandi-blade
${modID}:MandiBlade.FLAVOR: A trophy pried from a behemoth biter.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yStrikes cost #b1 less and #yExhaust. Heal #b2 whenever you play a #yStrike.

${modID}:SmolderingLog.NAME: Smoldering Log
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yConsume, add a random card to your hand.
